titleStmt.title: The late news, or, Message from Bruxels unmasked and His Majesty vindicated from the base calumny and scandal therein fixed on him.
titleStmt.author: Evelyn, John, 1620-1706.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Evelyn by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
